mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES( seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, null #{price}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no, p.prod_name, p.prod_detail, p.manufacture_day, p.price, p.image_file, p.reg_date , nvl(t.tran_status_code, 1) as tran_Code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND p.prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.*, nvl(TRIM(t.tran_status_code), 1) AS tran_code FROM transaction t, product p WHERE t.prod_no(+) = p.prod_no
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.price LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no DESC
ORDER BY p.price DESC
ORDER BY p.price ASC
ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.*, nvl(t.tran_status_code, 1) FROM transaction t, product p WHERE t.prod_no(+) = p.prod_no
AND p.prod_no LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.price LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
) countTable
